ABSTRACT
A classiñcation ¡nd dcscription of El specicô and its relation to tho sodiments was provided by the snrdy of the distribution of be¡rtonic fora¡ninifers based on 104 sarnple for Llbahrba
Bay, ubatuba. The assembly of foraminifers were related fo the various no biotic paramçters previousþ obtaired.
Some of the ÉpeciÈE w€re photogrâphed by eletronic scanning microscopo in order to esråblish a more precise taxonomic classiûoalion. Based on the species quantificatioq it was possiblo to appþ ccologicat index as riohness, dominanoc, diversþ and oquity of speoies.
Among the species ralysed,,4rrrmonia beccarii should bo montioned for ifs abundåncÈ
and morphological differcnciation. which reflects tÈmporature variations of maritimo cuffonts in the
area.
The testimonies revealed differences among themselves ¡s litolos/ r",ariations ¡nd in the eners/ Êpent in the deposition of the sedimentary layer.
